name: pitch-black shadow
description:
pitch-black shadow art style LoRA

This adds a pitch-black shadow to the hair.

You can draw cool illustrations.

Changes from V1 to V2

  • Compared to V1, the effect on the eyes is reduced.

    (Eyes were often cloudy when V1 was used)

  • The model has been resized.

Light hair color is recommended.

blonde hair, white hair, light blue hair, light green hair

weight:0.8-1.6

Tried on these models:

  • meinapastel_V4
